   M A = |12|

   |2 3|   |12|   |2*12 + 3*0|   |24|

   |2 3|   |19|   |2*19 + 3*7|   |61|
   |1 4| * | 7| = |1*19 + 4*7| = |47|

4. Take the result modulo 26 to get the encrypted message in numerical form:
   |24|   |24 % 26|   |24|
   |12| = |12 % 26| = |12|

   |61|   |61 % 26|   | 9|

5. Convert the encrypted message back to letters using the given mapping:
   24 = Y, 12 = M, 9 = J, 21 = V

The encrypted message is "YMJV".
